column4: lilly - i would guess you load the live cd, mount your drive, and use an application to scan and repair the disk
lilly - sweet, forgive me, i am new to this myself. someone said earlier gparted had a scan and repair utility, i would look for that
LuXoR - can you set your IP in your router?
LuXoR - most routers have an option to set IP based on mac address
no i cant... the provider not giving me the password
